title: Advanced
files-clean-up-description: Deletes all files that are not used by any maps.
stream-file-browser-description: Streams files and folders for large directories. Turning this off might result in a game freeze when opening a large directory.
maps-recalculate-filters-description: Recalculates all filters for all maps.
maps-scores-clean-up-description: Removes scores from maps that you do not have anymore.
